title: Who is Strictly Come Dancing’s Janette Manrara married to?
text:
Janette Manrara is back on Strictly for her seventh series (Picture: WireImage)

Strictly Come Dancing’s Janette Manrara is back on the series for 2019, partnering paralympic table tennis champion Will Bayley MBE.

The pair have made a good showing in the first fortnight of competition, winning praise from the judges for their quickstep in the first week and salsa in week two, despite the challenges they’ve already faced.

Janette’s currently one of the longest-serving pros on Strictly, having been a part of the series since 2013 and having partnered the likes of Jake Wood, Peter Andre, Aston Merrygold and Dr Ranj Singh during her time on the show.

And of course her other half is a regular fixture on the series too – but just which of the Strictly pros is she married to?

Here’s what you need to know…

Who is Strictly Come Dancing’s Janette Manrara married to?

Janette and Aljaz were married in 2017 (Picture: PA)

Janette is married to fellow Strictly pro Aljaz Skorjanec, who also joined the series in 2013 – and won it that year with Abbey Clancy.

Advertisement

Advertisement

The pair met while they were both starring in stage show Burn The Floor and got engaged in 2015, with Janette posting a pic of the pair celebrating together in a restaurant shortly after the Slovenian dancer had proposed.

They were married in 2017 in front of celebrity guests including Louise Redknapp, Daisy Lowe and 2016 champion Ore Oduba, as well as Strictly dancers Anton du Beke, AJ Pritchard and former show pro Chloe Hewitt.

Janette later shared a snap on Instagram in which she described the wedding as ‘the happiest weekend of my life’.

Janette is partnering Will Bayley MBE on the show this year (Picture: BBC)

Aljaz revealed earlier this year he’d love to start a family, admitting in June he was feeling broody ahead of fellow pro Gorka Marquez becoming a dad.

‘I’ve always felt very broody for the last 10 years,’ he told This Morning.

‘I’ve always wanted kids but it’s just never [happened yet]. We’ll see what happens. 50 per cent is down to me.’

Aljaz is partnering Viscountess Emma Weymouth on the series this year, with the couple making it through to Saturday’s annual movie week after delivering a cha cha in week one and a tango last Saturday night.

Strictly Come Dancing continues on BBC One on Saturday night at 7.10pm.

description: Janette Manrara is back on Strictly Come Dancing, partnering Will Bayley MBE - but who's her husband?
